name: C# API  for Arabic Word Net
short_description:
DLL library  for C# language  to Access  XML database for Arabic wordnet (AWN) from this page 

http://www.talp.upc.edu/index.php/technology/resources/multilingual-lexicons-and-machine-translation-resources/multilingual-lexicons/72-awn

you can get a java source code API from here
https://sourceforge.net/projects/javasourcecodeapiarabicwordnet/
